rows.label: qst610502_msg0001
rows.name:
Ye're proper strong fighters,
you lot, and ain't that a fact.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0002
rows.name:
I cannae believe I let ye
get all the way here... I'm
a failure as a guardsman.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0003
rows.name:
Captain Mehmed trusted me to
protect this place, but I guess
I just wasn't strong enough.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0004
rows.name:
The 12th Company was everything to
me, but now...what am I going to
do once the Captain lets me go?

rows.label: qst610502_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, ye want to know more
about this fine tower?

rows.label: qst610502_msg0006
rows.name:
It's named for a fellow named Bathein.
Finest sniper there ever was.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0007
rows.name:
Wasn't a monster or brigand in the land
that would dare approach the capital
while he was at his station here.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0008
rows.name:
Kept the peace of the capital all by
his self, so he did, by making sure
nobody could get near this tower.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0009
rows.name:
So when I showed the Captain my sniping
skills, he told me to become the next
Bathein. Proper proud, I was.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0010
rows.name:
The Special Inquisitor? Here
to talk some sense into me?

rows.label: qst610502_msg0011
rows.name:
Hah! As if I'd lend an ear
to someone I've never met.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0012
rows.name:
My duty comes first. Before
anything! I owe it to the Captain!

rows.label: qst610502_msg0013
rows.name:
Much as I hate to admit it, though...
You lot are stronger than I am.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0014
rows.name: So I'll hear you out. Just this once.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0015
rows.name: All right, then. I get the picture.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0016
rows.name:
So my new orders are to head to Temperantia
and take out anyone who tries to misuse
those Divine Beast weapons.

rows.label: qst610502_msg0017
rows.name:
I may not have been able to
become the next Bathein...

rows.label: qst610502_msg0018
rows.name:
But I'll put my heart and
soul into fulfilling my
duty, and that's a fact!
